Cam::
She sniffed at the bot. "It smells funny."

KitKat::
She panted hard and could barely move. She whispered  "pain, it 
hurts." She could barely keep her optics open.


Cam::
She looked up at Blackfang, "Think we should help it?"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Blackfang had heard nothing but jumped after Cam. If there were
> enemies, it wasn't time for her to get caught again.
> 
> Blackfang: Careful, girl! It might be Preds... Be as silent as 
possible.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> 
wrote:
> > KitKat::
> > She lay there under the bush, panting hard. Her commlink was on 
> > speaker mode, not silent mode. She winced in pain and tried to 
get 
> > up, but fell back on her side.
> > 
> > Cam::
> > Her little fox ears perked up as she let go of the drone. She 
looked 
> > up at Blackfang and tried to act all big. "Hear that noise? I 
thought 
> > it came from over there."  She pointed with her paw. Then, she 
dashed 
> > after it. "Come on Blackfang. I wanna see what's out there."
> > 
> > KitKat::
> > She was in too much pain to notice the sound of fox paws heading 
in 
> > her direction.
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> > > : : SharpClaw : : SharpClaw had been watching everything in the 
> > holodeck in silence. He was now pretty good and pissed. He walks 
up 
> > to Maxima. SharpClaw: You are foolish. I suggest you start making 
> > friends. From what I've seen, your attitude serves no purpose but 
to 
> > piss bots off. That's dangerous. You dont need enemies within 
your 
> > own faction. He looks at Blackstorm. SharpClaw: You, my dear, 
show 
> > great promise. Let her program fighting ability into you, it'll 
help, 
> > but dont reply on it. Artificial programs are crap. We are 
> > transformers, we are more advanced then that. Instead of being 
> > programmed like simple computers, we should learn are skills 
> > ourselves. He walks out of the room, opening his comm. SharpClaw: 
> > KitKat, where have you ran off too?
> > > 
> > > 
> > > ---------------------------------
> > > Do you Yahoo!?
> > > The New Yahoo! Search - Faster. Easier. Bingo.
